src:
Selektor Kambodže igra za Vitese
Kejsuke Honda se vratio u Holandiju

06 Nov 2019

Četiri meseca bez kluba i konačno: Vitese! Kejsuke Honda se posle dve godine vraća u evropski fudbal. Iskusni Japanac (33) do kraja sezone će igrati u Erediviziji gde je i počeo interkontinentalnu karijeru, doduše u VVV Venlu.
Ono što je takođe bitno je što će Honda nastaviti i dalje da obavlja funkciju selektora Kambodže (?!) što više govori o kvalitetu fudbala u toj azijskoj zemlji, jer jasno je da će mu Vitese biti prioritetan zadatak.
Sam izbor kluba je samo na prvi pogled čudan, ali sve postaje mnogo jasnije kad znamo da na klupi Vitesea sedi Leonid Slucki, koji je vodio i moskovski CSKA dok je Honda pravio ima na velikoj sceni u periodu od 2010. do 2013. godine. Pride, tehnički direktor Vitesea Mohamed Alah je Hondu i doveo u Venlo još januara 2008. godine. Dobro poznata lica dakle.“Dugo nisam igrao u Holandiji, nadam se da me se fudbalski fanatici u Holandiji još sećaju. Kako bilo, uradiću sve što mogu da ih na terenu impresioniram. Želim da budem važan deo ovog tima i jedva čekam da zaigram. Lepo je i što ću posle VVV Venla opet igrati u žuto-crnom dresu“, rekao je Honda.
Ugovor do kraja sezone, brojne povrede vezista su primorale klub da dovedu pojačanje. Honda na vrhuncu bio bi opasno pojačanje. Honda danas? Ko to zna. Solidan je bio u Pačuki i Melburnu, ali ipak su to Pačuka i Melburn.
(FOTO: Twitter/MijnVitesse)
text:
Cambodia selector plays for the Vites
Kejsuke Honda returned to the Netherlands

06 Nov 2019

Four months without a club and finally: Knights! Casey Honda returns to European football after two years. The experienced Japanese (33) will play in the Eredivision for the rest of the season, where he began his intercontinental career, though at VVV Venlo.
What is also important is that Honda will continue to serve as Cambodia's selector (?!) as much as possible about the quality of football in that Asian country, as it is clear that Vitese will be his priority.
The very choice of the club is strange at first glance, but it becomes much clearer when we know that on the bench of Vitesea sits Leonid Slucki, who also led Moscow CSKA while Honda was making it on the big stage from 2010 to 2013. Pride, Vitese Technical Director Mohamed Allah brought Honda to Venlo back in January 2008. Well known faces therefore. ”I have not played in the Netherlands for a long time, I hope that football fanatics in the Netherlands still remember me. Anyway, I will do everything I can to impress them on the field. I want to be an important part of this team and I can't wait to play. It is also nice that after the VVV Venla I will play again in a yellow-black jersey, "Honda said.
By the end of the season, numerous injuries to the midfielder forced the club to bring reinforcements. Honda at its peak would be a dangerous reinforcement. Honda today? Who knows. It was solid in Pachuca and Melbourne, but still it was Pachuca and Melbourne.
(PHOTO: Twitter / MijnVitesse)
